website_summaries.verdict: Customers find these gloves useful for various types of work, but reliability over time is questionable.
pros: Stands up well to all weather conditions with its breathable water-repellent material

customer_reviews.title: but these are great. I don't use them professionally or anything
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid gloves! A lot of gloves blow out a seam after some hard use, but these are great. I don't use them professionally or anything, but I have a couple months and numerous projects and they have held up great. My last big project was breaking down about a dozen fallen trees after hurricanes Irma and Maria hit my yard in PR. Hard days and lots of tossing rough logs and branches. They are still holding together great.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Durable with good dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I took these gloves with me to play Milsim Airsoft for a 24 hour event and loved them. The gloves hold up very well and keep the weather out. I did end up using some under armor liner gloves with these because of the sub freezing temps to keep my hands warmer. Down to around freezing they were pretty good, but much colder than that you would want a winter glove or some liner like I used. They are durable, while allowing for dexterity and protected my hands well.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Shocking right. I love the leather'ish reinforcement of these gloves. Adds great protection and work-ability in the hot spots of the hands. This is a summer set of gloves and not great in the rain. They will soak up water faster than a sponge and loose function. Go with a different material glove for wet season. But if it's sunny and dry, these are fantastic. Carhartt quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolos

customer_reviews.title: if it doesn't fit you must acquit
customer_reviews.text: I like the two materials and love the look. I ordered the xxl based on the size chart and the fact people said they fit tight. Well they are kind of tight but I wish i would of got the xl or maybe even the large. It fits well on the palm, wrist, back of hand and middle finger. Other two fingers are about 1/4 inch too long. The pinky is about 1/2 too long and the thumb is about 3/4 inches too long. So it fits well and is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The name says it all. These gloves are high-quality, fit true to size, and are very durable with stable stitching. I received them within the time expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.RoseMarie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are holding up very good and fit well. They have exceeded my expectations thus far. None of the lettering has come off and has not come undone at all at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Technerd87

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great for doing things that need precision. Warm but not bulky. These were for me, because my husband was gifted with a pair, and I liked them so much that I ordered these men's gloves for myself.
customer_reviews.author: D. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Not the best gloves. Used them for minimum work (moving boxes) ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best gloves. Used them for minimum work (moving boxes) finger tips started to wear out to the point where my finger shows. I really loved these gloves because they are really light. Wish I could fix the holes):
customer_reviews.author: P.H

customer_reviews.title: and fits nicely on your hands
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my fiance to use at work. He loves that they are durable but not bulky. The material is soft, stretchy, and fits nicely on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I ended up returning these, they were much thinner ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these, they were much thinner than I had thought they would be. Not warm enough for working outside in the winter, which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for large hands
customer_reviews.text: The XX Large size fit my hands very well. My index finger is about 3.5 inches long. I would say they are great for mild climates and I used them for hiking. They also provide for a secure and comfortable grip for my hiking poles.
customer_reviews.author: AlexG

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are extremely durable and the palms are water resistant as described. I wear them daily working in a refrigerated produce warehouse. I wouldn't use them for a snowball fight, but for handling cold, wet boxes they are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trees

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves, as well as anything else made by carhartt, are excellent quality. They are sleek and not to bulky. They were a great gift for my brother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Predictable
customer_reviews.text: they're just normal gloves.. don't last forever, but work well for a while (1-2 months of extreme use... 1-2 years of mild use)
customer_reviews.author: Liam K.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are very good for the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very good for the cold weather, but if they get wet, watch out. They do not protect from wet hands if it is raining and or snowing. They are very accurate on the ​size and they are a good looking glove, they could be better as far as water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit is as expected and they are very durable ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as expected and they are very durable. I have used them for many different outdoor activities both involving water and without water and they have had held up. Not even a fade of color. Will get another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my son who works as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who works as a carpenter. He loves them. Just ordered another pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Markle

customer_reviews.title: Warning - they won't actually do the work for you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to wear on a pipeline job. How many days has he worked since then? 0 - but the gloves are great!
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, I have very large hands so finding ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, I have very large hands so finding gloves is always a challenge. But I think I have found the ones for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight D.

customer_reviews.title: Good work gloves
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband to replace a worn out pair exactly like them. He uses them in the yard, and loves them because they are not bulky, and have the Velcro strap at the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Moonshadow

customer_reviews.title: Tough and seriously resilient to falls
customer_reviews.text: These are the most durable gloves ive had . And I do stupid s*** like fall down while riding through campus , so .... during winter and during fall(like falling down , not the season haha) these are great for riding and all purpose use in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: vbr

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: between pickup up pallets or sharp surfaces. These glove hold up to the test. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome comfy gloves I use for driving in the cold until the truck warms up.
customer_reviews.author: VinnyVavoom

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you need some protection or a bit of warmth, but still need high dexterity.
customer_reviews.author: BillnWa

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Work Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best work gloves for yard, farm and home maintenance. Sizing is as expected. Great gifts for guys.
customer_reviews.author: JPhilipps18

customer_reviews.title: Hard working hands
customer_reviews.text: Great work glove. Working outdoors in the Upstate New York winters is a breeze. Water proof and great in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not as warm as some other style gloves but I can maneuver things better with these opposed to gloves made of heavier material
customer_reviews.text: They fit really well. Not as warm as some other style gloves but I can maneuver things better with these opposed to gloves made of heavier material. I am going to use them for turkey hunting this spring also.
customer_reviews.author: David Reimers

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Best work glove I have ever put on my hands. Very comfortable, great grip, and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: calion

customer_reviews.title: I think I love all things Carharrt
customer_reviews.text: I think I love all things Carharrt. These, which were a gift to a friend, are no exception. He reports that they are warm and dexterous, he can pick up coins and put in a full day's work. Good grip, velcro cuff. Nice glove.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gloves so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gloves so far, they are a snug fit and don't let any dirt down your sleeve. I do wish they didn't get wet so easily however.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son works with a carpentry crew and he love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent caving gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gear on a caving trip. They provided the grip and comfort desired. Only request that the manufacturer design sizes for youth.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Gloves
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is picky about work gloves, I can say that these are top notch. They provide superb grip and allow high levels of dexterity for fine movement and manipulation. Quality material, great fit, easy on easy off. Note that these are not heavy duty, high protection gloves.
customer_reviews.author: BSC

customer_reviews.title: quality control isn't that awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these a couple dozen times and they are holding up okay so far. The index finger on the right glove is WAAY tighter than the index finger on the left glove. So,,, quality control isn't that awesome.
customer_reviews.author: EddieAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Work gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my brother as a present. My brother says These are great work gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Starrynite20121

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these gloves for two days. I use them for construction. Day 1 they started to rub thin in fingers & stitching came undone a little in 1 finger. Day 2 they got a little wet but they stitching came apart in several places & busted holes through the hands. They are now going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Durable, I cut the fingers off. I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, I cut the fingers off. I used them on a Christmas tree lot, they kept sap off my hands and kept me somewhat warm too. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves that stand up to Carhartt quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a few pairs of these gloves and loves them. We throw them in the washer once a week and hang them to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: particularly i have long fingers but not fat hands i got the xxl and they fit perfect. These would be tight fight for a person .
customer_reviews.text: I have very large hands, particularly i have long fingers but not fat hands i got the xxl and they fit perfect. These would be tight fight for a person who has thicker hands. Very warm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with Carhartt
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of work gloves. Not very good for working in the cold but great grips and a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: A Peterson

customer_reviews.title: These run big
customer_reviews.text: These run big. Usually get a medium in most gloves, but the medium in these were too large. I have meaty hands too. So these were disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jcn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in construction. This gloves still allow him to work without the bulk of GLOVES. They are also keeping his hands really warm. I recommend these to anyone. And the size was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding gloves that fit well and can still use in most situations without having to remove to handle small items. these work great in the field and are great around the house.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, Usually hate wearing gloves, but can work, and still keep my hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After aggressively handling and pulling rope for 2 hours, I can tell that they will probably develop holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mid 20's Male

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair at work. So far so good, I like the fit. They give a decent combination of protection while not sacrificing too much 'feel' with the hands. Hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not for snow. I use them to keep my hands off the steering wheel in cold weather and maybe keep the wind of me for the walk to/from the car. They are by no means winter gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Colin S. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for blah
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with them they may be good with gardening or riding ATV or horse. Not for doing decent work wrenching or installing Direct TV
customer_reviews.author: keggers06

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting glove just wore out a little quick.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these gloves. Actually debating on buying another pair. They fit nice, good feel & dexterity. Definitely not waterproof or for cold weather but a good work glove that may last a month or two max on a job site. I've yet to find a glove I can't destroy at some point anyway. I have really fast hands. Boys in the yard call me Tommy Gun.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad fits well
customer_reviews.text: Not Bad fits well, the Straps that locks it in can be annoying at times; Other that that, absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny ,.

customer_reviews.title: The gloves have a good fit and they breathe well
customer_reviews.text: The gloves have a good fit and they breathe well, but don't buy them if you're looking for something heavy-duty. They also don't keep your hands very warm. I wear them working as a produce clerk and they are very fitting for that, however.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bajier

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent yard gloves. I like the water repellant palms and fronts of fingers because there is always something wet to pick up or work on in the yard. Not for warmth, only for protection.
customer_reviews.author: InspectorMCP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best glove I've ever purchased! Why don't you keep more of them in stock??? Multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Could have been warmer. They are attractive but if its below 40 degrees you may want an insulator or to just buy a different pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son since he works out in the cold everyday. He loves them, he does wear a liner for extra warmth in those cold, cold, rainy days but overall he is happy with the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tanker

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. Purchased for a family member who wears them for work and he thinks they are perfect for his type of work.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look & feel of these gloves. They fit great. They're not really all that warm though. Below 30deg & you're gonna start to feel it if you're out for extended periods but I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: eis61374

customer_reviews.title: So happy I was able to find these for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. He is able to grip things when he is working and helps keep his hands warm. So happy I was able to find these for him. Made the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves for working around the yard. Keep mine on pocket on mower, good quality and real good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Gibney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My dad raved over these gloves, likes them very much and said they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: c hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very useful good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality as you would expect from Carhartt. Would purchase again. Not so thick that you loose your flexibility . Very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of two

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be quality gloves but only time will tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be quality gloves but only time will tell. I will know when I complete many yards tasks that frequently wear through the finger coverings.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product thanka
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves. I am a truck driver they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan n.

customer_reviews.title: Will definately order again in the future
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my husband, he is very pleased with the item. It is exactly what we were looking for. Durable, not bulky, and warm.
customer_reviews.author: AmberLynn

customer_reviews.title: Not plumbing gloves but durable
customer_reviews.text: They're good for light-duty stuff, shoveling, lifting, carrying, not for heavier work. I'm a plumber I don't recommend them as a plumbing work glove.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Began to tear after relatively light use within a month.
customer_reviews.author: JackBK201

customer_reviews.title: Nice work gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice work gloves. Well made and fit well. I would buy them again when needed
customer_reviews.author: Joe in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Haven't used them yet but they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: metal detecting
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is constantly metal detecting. He does a lot of digging in the dirt, which results in digging up rusty pieces of metal. I bought these for him so that he doesn't cut his fingers and get an infection. He says they fit great and absolutely loves using them!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are tough gloves that feel nice. They are a bit big on me so I have to pull them off sometimes when using fingertips. Only 4 stars because once they get wet, they are wet. To be expected I guess but don't buy these expecting them to be waterproof. If you want water resistance get something with a rubberized palm and finger area. Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zueck

customer_reviews.title: They are flexible and thin enough for dexterity, but ...
customer_reviews.text: They are flexible and thin enough for dexterity, but offer ample protection. They won't be the warmest or rugged gloves you'll have, but for the price and dexterity they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thin and cheap. But they work. I wouldnt by another set.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I never wear gloves when I'm working but since its cold lately I'm forced to. These gloves are flexible enough to where I can still wear them while installing nuts and bolts, while still keeping my hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: The Electrician

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and it will keep your hands warm if the temperature above 40.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking glove, giving it as a gift to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy user of work gloves. Great fit and comfort. Can get a little warm while wearing but may just be due to the fact I am not used to wearing gloves. Good grip. Over price for these is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whitewolf

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt Gloves An Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit well, are designed to be comfortable yet not hinder hand movements. Well-made, soft, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cool weather or driving gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves will not stand up to heavy duty work, but they will stand up to anything else. Very lightweight, but very durable and comfortable. Anyone looking for a lightweight glove, could do no better. You can easily manipulate keys while wearing these, but counting change with them is a bit more difficult. I love them. I have purchased numerous Carhartt products over the years, mostly through Amazon, and I have always been pleasantly surprised with the quality and value. I highly recommend this name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C. Felton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beat these up pretty good and still no rips or holes.... great gloves
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. They fit great and shipped quickly. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Wkearce

customer_reviews.title: Good quality thin work gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. Thin, so will be easy to work in. Bought these and a Carhartt Quilted Duck Jacket for my son to use while working outside in winter months.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gloves were perfect fit and look sturdy enough. Only time will tell how they wear and last.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Abbe

customer_reviews.title: awesome work gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect to work in very durable. I wear them under winter gloves and take the bulky gloves off to work in these
customer_reviews.author: era

customer_reviews.title: Not fully water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Wind blows right through back of glove and the Velcro closure flap is on the back of the glove (I prefer the palm side) Will work ok for inside work just not as weather resistant as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: He loves them! Bought my husband these gloves for the second time he wears them at work everyday and says they are great
customer_reviews.author: nicole gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and warm
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit great as I have large hands it's hard to find the right gloves. They are also very warm and seem durable. I would highly recommend especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like these things. Fit and finish is good. The name on the back of the hand looks catchy. I'll probably order another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: JGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A little to nice to use for the nastier jobs.
customer_reviews.text: They are good gloves--still haven't put them to the test--I have a crappier pair I am still wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves! Much better than the Set Wear pair that I previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Direct Technical Event Production

customer_reviews.title: Good for Big Hands
customer_reviews.text: My husband has really large hands and finding gloves to fit him properly can be difficult. He used these this weekend to clean up a community garden including stakes and thorny bushes. They worked great and fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Saved my hands 100 times. This is my second pair. The first pair lasted a long time but with heavy use they do wear and rip eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work gloves are to be a present. They are what I wanted, and look OK to me!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top Notch material and perfect fit!!!!! This is my second pair already in one year.
customer_reviews.author: DaCor

customer_reviews.title: these gloves work great. the only downfall is that they don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for work which involves moving auto parts and heavy boxes. these gloves work great. the only downfall is that they don't have the waterproofing layer for when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: DetroitLove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit!! I have huge hands and they fit very well and are heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: jimobewon

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & feel
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves. I just bought my third pair. They fit nice and they are pretty rugged. They are not water proof - they don't claim to be - but they are light and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MarkE

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt makes the best work gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Best work gloves ever! I've worn hundreds of different kinds of gloves. Definitely worth the price, they last.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My nephew works in a Safeway Wearhouse and loves these ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew works in a Safeway Wearhouse and loves these gloves. This is the second or third pair I've bought him. Hard gloves for hard work.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla M. Sensi

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre gloves for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I went to New York with these and was very disappointed. They really don't keep your hands that warm.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, not as warm as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a little more protection against the cold but they are still excellent gloves for working and keep me warm. No bulk whatsoever to them, which is exactly what I wanted. Ill be using them for years I assume.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

product_meta.title: Carhartt Men's The Fixer Spandex Work Glove with Water Repellant Palm
product_meta.description:
A great all-around work glove, the fixer spandex work glove with water repellant palm will help you get the job done.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :10.7 x 6.2 x 1.3 inches; 3.17 Ounces
 * Item model number :A548
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :March 13, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Carhartt Mens Gloves
 * ASIN :B005I34BZE

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #229,079 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)  *  #1492 inSafety Work Gloves 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars284 ratings A great all-around work glove, the fixer spandex work glove with water repellant palm will help you get the job done.
feature_bullets: Elastic cuff with hook and loop closures
Spot wash by hand in luke warm water with mild detergent. Hang to dry. Do not use hot water. Do not put in dryer.
